Articles.Content:
When will KSP console receive the "On Final Approach" update?

Edited June 11, 2022 by CC1134
Typo
Probably when it's done.
Im seriously wondering what the console devs are doing right now. They are probably getting paid for staying there and doing nothing.

3 hours ago, Aerodynamic Kerbal said:

Im seriously wondering what the console devs are doing right now. They are probably getting paid for staying there and doing nothing.

They're probably working on making dres real.
ok freal what  is happening it's been months we need something

We won't. Let's be honest, KSP on console is dead and has been for over a year. I've given up hope on this joke of a game. We should have had both 1.11 and1.12 at least six months ago. It's embarassing that the devs have failed this hard.

Edited June 21, 2022 by JimmyJenkinson
forgot a space and it was bugging me

KSP on console was kinda just a bad idea anyways, PC has also been dead for a year tho, 1.11 and 1.12 arent that useful honestly, and just added mod features to stock, but worse than the mod, I seriously doubt KSP on console will get another update, wait for KSP2 or go on PC and get some mods, thats how I feel

On 6/23/2022 at 7:56 AM, kspnerd122 said:

KSP on console was kinda just a bad idea anyways, PC has also been dead for a year tho, 1.11 and 1.12 arent that useful honestly, and just added mod features to stock, but worse than the mod, I seriously doubt KSP on console will get another update, wait for KSP2 or go on PC and get some mods, thats how I feel

I mean, 1.11 and 1.12 were fairly substantial updates, and it really irks me that the console devs left so many game-breaking bugs unfixed. If we can't get the updates, we should at least get a few patches.
